00028 namespace Hyperspace {
00029 
00030   size_t encoded_length_dir_entry(DirEntryT &dir_entry) {
00031     return 1 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(dir_entry.name);
00032   }
00033 
00034   void encode_dir_entry(uint8_t **buf_ptr, DirEntryT &dir_entry) {
00035     uint8_t bval = (dir_entry.isDirectory) ? 1 : 0;
00036     *(*buf_ptr)++ = bval;
00037     Serialization::encode_string(buf_ptr, dir_entry.name);
00038   }
00039 
00040   bool decode_range_dir_entry(uint8_t **buf_ptr, size_t *remaining_ptr, DirEntryT &dir_entry) {
00041     uint8_t bval;
00042     if (!Serialization::decode_byte(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr, &bval))
00043       return false;
00044     dir_entry.isDirectory = (bval == 0) ? false : true;
00045     return Serialization::decode_string(buf_ptr, remaining_ptr, dir_entry.name);
00046   }
00047 }
